name: Afternoon.co
long_description:
Afternoon.co empowers ecommerce founders to make better business decisions with real time financial metrics. We pair it with managed bookkeeping and tax services, to reduce administrative burden on founders. 

Accountants struggle serving 4 million+ of ecommerce brands in the US, because of complexity in sales tax, multiple sales channels and inventory management. We automate a large portion of bookkeeping by integrating with their sales and inventory systems, so founders can spend time doing admin work.
one_liner: Accounting software and bookkeeping service for ecommerce brands
